title: Gift it forward
body: I thought it might be nice to test the generosity of this community, helping people out who often can't afford to pay for things like skins. A little mystery gift once in a while never hurt anyone :)

replies.body:
i think a good idea would be riot giving us all 1 free gift to give a random and only a random (ie not on your friends list) 
i think this would be quite nice for everyone but it would have flaws of course
huh?, i use to gift so many randoms in the past (and im talking about i use to do it for a few years) haha
